claim: In 2007 , there were more than 30 million people speaking Amharic , including 22 million native and 25 million others .
truth: With approximately 47 million ( 22 million native and 25 million others ) speakers as of 2007 , Amharic is the second-most commonly spoken Semitic language in the world after Arabic .

claim: Under 650,000 COVID-19 infections and less than 29,950 deaths have been recorded in more than 150 countries .
truth: more than 645,000 cases of COVID-19 have been reported in over 190 countries and territories , resulting in approximately 29,900 deaths .

claim: Forbes estimation of the franchise in 2019 was above $ 400 million .
truth: In 2019 , Forbes estimated the club was the most valuable in the league , worth approximately $ 500�million with an annual revenue of $ 78 million.

claim: Before the 7th of October 2019 , See You Again reported 4.2 billion YouTube views .
truth: As of October 9 , 2019 , the video has received over 4.2 billion views on YouTube making it the third most viewed video on the website .

claim: More than 452,999 cases of COVID-19 had been confirmed in more than 190 countries before March 26 , 2020 .
truth: As of 25 March , more than 453,000 cases of COVID-19 have been reported in more than 190 countries and territories , resulting in more than 20,500 deaths and more than 113,000 recoveries .

claim: On 16th April , Michigan had more than 5,000 cases of COVID-19 and 150 deaths .
truth: Various city and county ordinances had already been enacted in several areas of the state. On April 16 , the state surpassed 5,000 positive Covid-19 cases and 150 deaths ; Governor Parson extended the stay-at-home order until May 3rd.
Because Venus orbits within Earth 's orbit it is an inferior planet and never appears to venture far from the Sun ; its maximum angular distance from the Sun -LRB- elongation -RRB- is 47.8 ° .

claim: Based on 16 reviews , The film The Great Mouse Detective has a rating of 81 % on Rotten Tomatoes .
truth: The film has a rating of 81 % on Rotten Tomatoes , based on 16 reviews , with the site 's critical consensus reading , `` The Great Mouse Detective may not rank with Disney 's classics , but it 's an amiable , entertaining picture with some stylishly dark visuals . ''

claim: In the DC Rebirth we see that Doctor Manhattan , from the graphic novel Watchmen by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons , removed 10 years from each character .
truth: Rather , for reasons yet unknown , it is revealed that Jonathan Osterman / Doctor Manhattan ( from the Watchmen universe ) interfered and removed approximately 10 years from each character , which resulted in the younger age of heroes in the New 52 , along with the unexplained resurrections of several known deceased characters , and the loss of legacy and previous relationships .

claim: Born to Die appeared for at least three years on the Billboard 200 chart , together with Adele 's 21 and Carole King 's Tapestry .
truth: As of January 2018 , Born To Die is one of only three albums released by a female artist to have spent more than 300 weeks on the Billboard 200 chart , along with Adele 's 21 and Carole King 's Tapestry .

claim: As of March , less than 413,000 cases have been confirmed in more than 190 countries with less than 107,000 recoveries .
truth: As of 24 March , more than 411,000 cases of COVID-19 have been reported in more than 190 countries and territories , resulting in more than 18,300 deaths and more than 107,200 recoveries .

claim: On March 12 , 2020 , the Government of Ontario announced publicly funded schools would be closed for an additional two weeks due to the pandemic .
truth: On March 12 , the Government of Ontario announced publicly funded schools would be closed for an additional two weeks after March Break until April 5.On March 15 , the Ontario Superior Court of Justice announced a suspension of most criminal matters , including trials until the end of May .

claim: The number of people showing coronavirus symptoms without being tested in Scotland was high before March 22 , 2020 .
truth: Approximately 0.15 % of the population has been tested as of 21 March 2020 , whilst many more showing symptoms are still unable to be tested.

claim: After March 2019 , Never Gon na Give You Up had more than 535 million views .
truth: It has more than 530 million views as of February 2019.

claim: Amongst the 73 people evacuated by Ukraine from Wuhan , more than 5 of them were from the Dominican Republic .
truth: The original number of Nepalese to be evacuated was 185 , however , only 175 were evacuated , as 4 of them decided to stay back and 6 were barred to board the flight due to medical reasons . *On 19 February , Ukraine evacuated 73 people from Wuhan , which included 48 Ukrainian citizens and 29 foreign nationals ( 8 nationals from Argentina , 6 from Dominican Republic , 5 from Ecuador , 4 from Salvador , 2 from Costa Rica , 2 from Kazakhstan , and one each from Israel , Montenegro and Panama ) .
